item.title: get_hostids_logs.py
item.description: """ Get the host IDS logs. Important manual pages: http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Software_Component_HostIps http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Software_Component_HostIps/getObject http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Software_Component_HostIps License: http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License Author: SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> """ import SoftLayer import json # Your SoftLayer API username and key. USERNAME = 'set me' API_KEY = 'set me' hostidsId = 2665230 client = SoftLayer.Client(username=USERNAME, api_key=API_KEY) hostidsService = client['SoftLayer_Software_Component_HostIps'] objectMask = "mask[ipsEvents[signature],blockedApplicationEvents]" try: response = hostidsService.getObject(id=hostidsId, mask=objectMask) print(json.dumps(response, sort_keys=True, indent=2, separators=(',', ': '))) except SoftLayer.SoftLayerAPIError as e: print("Unable to get the logs.
